    an abstract class to establish database to store transactions from currency conversion

    The TriviaActivity class represents the main activity for the Trivia Quiz application.

    A fragment that displays the details of a TriviaScore object.

    An activity that displays the top 10 high scores in a RecyclerView.

    An adapter class for displaying a list of TriviaScores in a RecyclerView.

    TriviaScore
    This class represents a data model for storing Trivia scores in a database using Room.
    TriviaScoreDatabaseHelper
    This class serves as a helper for managing the Trivia scores database using SQLite.
